full_summary:
# 6D063-225886 Millwright and Machinist Services
### Tender Information
* **Reference Number**: WS4234118942-Doc4294929542
* **Publication Date**: November 20, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date & Time**: December 18, 2023, 2:00 PM EST.
* **Tender Status**: Expired
### Procurement Information
* **Buying Agency**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Agency**: Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Standing Offer
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
### Description of the Requirement
The Department of Public Works and Government Services on behalf of the Public Health Agency of Canada is seeking to establish a standing offer for Millwright and Machinist Services. The services will be provided on an as required basis for a period of 5 years and are expected to commence on January 15, 2024.

### Scope of Services
The following services are required:

* Skilled licensed labor
* Tools and equipment
* Supervision
* Material necessary for various types of Millwright and Machinist services

The services will be required for Public Health Agency Canada facilities in Winnipeg, Manitoba.

### Eligibility Requirements
Eligibility requirements for this RFP are subject to the procurement under Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on a highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

### Instructions to Suppliers
Interested suppliers should access the formal Bid Solicitation Document through thefollowing link: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18056870?extsite=MTgwNTY4NzBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Bids will be accepted up to 2:00 PM EST on December 18, 2023. Late bids will not be considered.

Contact: Sabieh Ullah, Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), sabieh.ullah@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca.  Assignments will be made based on the evaluation and skills demonstrated by the selected supplier.
